item.title: What will happen in 100 years?
item.description: That is a very difficult question to answer (which I don’t answer anywhere in this post: go away). Anyone who attempts to do so, must be a genius or a fool, perhaps a little of both. Philipp Lenssen on Google Blogoscoped, observes how one of those is true. Here is a more detailed analysis. John Watkins, must have been quite a visionary considering the depth of his predictions and how much of it has come true.
